query:
SELECT ff.*, c.nome as cenarioNome, forn.nome as fotografoNome
FROM fotos_formando ff
JOIN execucao_formando ef ON ff.execucaoFormandoId = ef.id
JOIN formandos f ON ef.formandoId = f.id
LEFT JOIN cenarios c ON ff.cenarioId = c.id
LEFT JOIN fornecedores forn ON ff.fotografoId = forn.id
WHERE f.nome LIKE '%Álvaro Pontual%'
ORDER BY ff.id
